Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 80th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 2006...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Tampa Bay on 5/25/2007 (Going to CHN: P J. Garland, P J. Fogg, DH R. Mondesi. Going to TB: P J. Samardzija, P J. Hirsch, P M. Stutes, LF F. Lewis, LF J. Reddick)...
Injured on 4/24/2008 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/23/2011, off Blake Wood (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/5/2011, off Tim Lincecum (SF)...
Injured on 8/24/2011 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/2014, hitting .391 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Arizona, driving in 5 runs on 7/26/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/1/2017 to a 3-year deal worth $13,610,000 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against Los Angeles (A) on 5/22/2018...
Injured on 7/16/2018 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 8/21/2021...
Injured on 8/10/2022 with a Fractured Foot, out for 2-3 weeks...
Hit 3 homeruns against Texas, driving in 4 runs on 8/17/2024...
